name: Swift Swipe (Vexigo)
description:
You are a criminal and you have to steal as many items as possible before the cops arrive in 30 seconds

Made in 7 hours for a private Game Jam with theme "30 Seconds"

Sound effects done in SFXR

Music by Evan King

Police siren sounds from: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC85x_tXNUtspJKjd06VZFeg

All models by Jonas
